Text: Thank you, dias_vld, for using bayimg.com for posting the screens.  It loads quickly and generaly has a "cleaner" feel to it than most of the other places people post screens.  As a consumer of torrents, I am much more likely to view screens (and as a result decide to download a torrent) if they are hosted at bayimg.com.
I totally agree with you, man...Bayimg is the best place to post pics these days. What about the stuff i been posting, what do u say? Any requests? ;)
